metadata.title: CVE-2018-5166 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
WebExtensions can use request redirection and a "filterReponseData" filterto bypass host permission settings to redirect network traffic and accesscontent from a host for which they do not have explicit user permission.This vulnerability affects Firefox < 60.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5166` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 60.0+build2-0ubuntu1
firefox-globalmenu - 60.0+build2-0ubuntu1
firefox-mozsymbols - 60.0+build2-0ubuntu1
firefox-testsuite - 60.0+build2-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '60.0+build2-0ubuntu1').
